result.arabic_text: قَالُوٓاْ أَتَعۡجَبِينَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِۖ رَحۡمَتُ ٱللَّهِ وَبَرَكَٰتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَمِيدٞ مَّجِيدٞ
result.translation: 73.Malayka teetil gacisak :atu Yallih amrii kee kay mekla qajjibsittaa ?Yallih Racmattaa kee kay barkat Nabii ibraahim buxah maraw siinil yanayik, diggah Yalli külli caalatal fayla le weeloola leeh, usuk nabnaa kee fayya cakkisita Rabbi kinni.
